column1: “US Coronavirus: The country is 'rounding the corner into a calamity' expert says with #COVID19 deaths projected to double soon.”  Please stay home if you do not need to go out. But if you must leave continue social distancing and WEAR A MASK.  https://t.co/oZuXlvbu4g

This crisis has put a strain on the U.S. economy and small businesses are in need of immediate relief. Our plan provides $500 billion in grants and interest-free loans to help Main Street businesses as they cope with the economic disruption caused by the COVID19 pandemic.

As more people go to the hospital due to #COVID19 the cost on hospitals to treat patients will increase. Our plan provides more than $150 billion to supporting community hospitals and health centers treating coronavirus patients ensuring they have the resources to continue.
Additionally the @HouseDemocrats plan creates a temporary Federal Pandemic Unemployment Compensation of $600 a week for any worker affected by #COVID19.

Our bill focuses on supporting working families and builds on the Families First Coronavirus Response Act by expanding paid sick days and family medical leave to ensure workers have access to these crucial benefits.

Over the weekend @senatemajldr McConnell put forward a coronavirus response bill that prioritizes corporations not American workers. The @HouseDemocrats plan we released is about protecting American families supporting healthcare workers and preventing the spread of #COVID19.
